name: The Beast in the City
description:
You are Frank Dober, an ex-detective turned private investigator. An old friend dropped off a case file at your office, and now you've got to get to work. Walk through the city interacting with people as you track down the most intense case of Dober's career. Can you solve the crime of the city, and redeem your mysterious past?

Browser version may be laggy, download the game for true experience!

Made by Parker Rogal, Devon Spence, and Curtis Weekusk-White as our final project while attending the RAIS video game design course.
